plot: A touching tribute to all fathers, Father Bear is a short film that depicts the tight loving bond between a father and a son. Although fatherhood is a responsibility, it is also a rewarding source of sweet happiness.
title: Father Bear
plot_es: A touching tribute to all fathers, Father Bear is a short film that depicts the tight loving bond between a father and a son. Although fatherhood is a responsibility, it is also a rewarding source of sweet happiness.
plot_en: A touching tribute to all fathers, Father Bear is a short film that depicts the tight loving bond between a father and a son. Although fatherhood is a responsibility, it is also a rewarding source of sweet happiness.
